definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Gears are weatherproofed and Babbit sprockets may be applied.
sentences.chinese: 齒輪抗大氣腐蝕的，並且可以應用巴氏合金鏈輪。

sentences.english: Double-roller chain and chain drive make stable and smooth running.
sentences.chinese: 雙節距滾子鏈及鏈輪傳動，無死點，運行平穩。

sentences.english: Hammerblow handwheel adapters can be furnished with handwheel or chainwheel construction.
sentences.chinese: 錘擊手輪接合器可以配置在手輪或鏈輪結構上。

sentences.english: This was the beginning of the Japanese derailleur and multi-sprocket freewheel industry.
sentences.chinese: 這是日本變速器和多開始，鏈輪，飛輪產業。

sentences.english: The structure of the injection mould with automatic thread demoulding by the chain gear transmission is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了鏈輪傳動自動脫螺紋注塑模結構。

sentences.english: An analytical formula for calculating conformal mapping function of the sprocket tooth profile is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了鏈輪齒廓保角映射函數的解析表達式。

sentences.english: Chain for use with chainwheel actuators.
sentences.chinese: 用於鏈輪執行器的鏈條。
